document_data.name: Ryllae Windwalker
document_data.mainbody: '''Ryllae Windwalker''' was the commander of [[Evermeet]]'s navy in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ryllae was often away from the isle leading patrols of the surrounding sea with her flagship, the ''[[Dolphin (ship)|Dolphin]]'', and other vessels. However, sometimes she sailed alone beyond the [[Wave Rocks]], coming near [[Moray]] and [[Gwynneth]].
document_data.Personality: Ryllae truly loved the sea and was very restless. Nobody knew what she sought when she sailed, even herself. Ryllae was very outspoken and free with her emotions despite her [[sun elf]] heritage. She was a very able wizard, warrior, and sailor.
document_data.Rumors: Some said Ryllae had [[aquatic elf]] blood.
document_data.Relationship: Ryllae had many sea elf friends and had good dealings with their ruler.
